item.name: Update Email Content in Editable Section
Update Email Content in Editable Section (Simpler)

urlencoded.value:
Available: ± 8,012 SF restaurant building
Vacant building is move-in ready with full kitchen and equipment, tables, chairs, walk-in coolers, etc.
Class C resort liquor license; allows Sunday sales, entertainment and after-hours food
Building is in fantastic condition, constructed 2002
Located in bustling downtown Mount Clemens
Excellent visibility at the intersection of North Main Street and Gratiot Avenue
Facility features large kitchen, serving area, and private party room with fireplace
New landscaping and sprinkler system
Site includes attached parking lot with ample customer parking
Sale asking price $800,000; call for lease rates
website
